segments.text: I hereby certify that ACME TRADING PRIVATE LIMITED is this day incorporated under the Companies Act, 2013 and that the company is limited.
Given under my hand and seal of office this 15th day of March, 2023.

Company Name: ACME TRADING PRIVATE LIMITED
Company Type: Private Limited Company
Date of Incorporation: 15/03/2023
Authorized Capital: Rs. 10,00,000/-
Registered Office: 123 Business Park, Sector 18, Gurgaon, Haryana - 122015, India

To carry on the business of trading, buying, selling, importing, exporting, manufacturing, processing, dealing in all types of chemicals, pharmaceuticals, industrial raw materials, finished goods, and allied products.
To carry on business as traders, distributors, stockists, dealers, agents, brokers, commission agents, and to enter into agreements with manufacturers and suppliers.

Director Name	Designation	DIN
Rahul Sharma	Managing Director	12345678
Priya Patel	Director	87654321
Amit Kumar	Independent Director	11223344
